about_the_game:
Experience a shattered and surreal dream filled with fascinating riddles, where your only guide is an elusive butterfly.
Can you make the journey and wake up?

Key Features:
  • Diverse riddles challenging the brain, eyes and ears.
  • A unique atmosphere
  • A handcrafted sound experience
  • Designed for VR and Motion Controllers explicitly


Wake up is a smaller game which will take between 20 and 40 minutes to complete, depending on the speed you are able to solve the riddles.

ABOUT BLACK CELL
Black Cell is a small independent team from Austria, venturing in the new and exciting world of Virtual Reality.
With Wake Up we have created our first game, exploring the limitations and possibilities of this new medium.

The goal is to create new experiences with a focus on a great mood, through the use of carefully created audio and visual design.

name: Wake Up

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows 7
  • Processor: Intel i5-4590 & AMD 8350
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GTX970, AMD Radeon R9 290
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • VR Support: SteamVR. Standing or Room Scale
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel® Core™ i7 4790
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GeForce® GTX 980
  • DirectX: Version 11

reviews:
“This small VR game is free, but has more to show than many other paid games on Steam. Definitely worth a look!”
78% – VR Nerds

“Wake Up is a Surreal, Immersive Vive Puzzler with Killer Sound Design.”
Thumbs up! – Road to VR

“Wake up is a fun distraction from, you know, all the shooting, so give it a try.”
10/10 – VR Circle
short_description: Experience a shattered and surreal dream filled with fascinating riddles, where your only guide is an elusive butterfly. Can you make the journey and wake up?
